column9: Another American type sandwich shop that provides hot and cold subs.  Many selections to choose from.  Can eat in or take away.  Prices are reasonable and place clean.

column7: A good sandwich with all you can think of!
column9:
Nice offer for good price.
You can get your sub heated in the oven - warm and nice cheese sub or just as it is. Many options to choose italian salami, ham, tuna,chicken,  olives, onion, lettuce, mustard, oil & vinegar, two types of cheese, tomato,...More

A franchise restaurant like Subway relies heavily on the restaurant holding to an expected standard.  This applies to recipes as well as using fresh ingredients. This restaurant used to have this standard but something has gone wrong recently.  Perhaps is it an attempt to save...More

column7: Subway is the McDonalds of sandwiches
column9: Quite pricey, soggy bread and often a mish mash of cold cuts and other ingredients. I like my food fresh and genuine, this is definately not a place for me.
A healthier kind of fastfood. Great variety of sandwiches (subs). Get a long one If you're really hungry or take a half If you just want a snack. Fast and tasty.

column7: good price and you know what you get
column9: go for the sub of the day, it\s a bit cheaper.  The place just across from the train station is conveniently located if you want to take a sandwich with you on the train.
